name: You Suck Trash
description:
Seas & co has launched a new project, Trashsucker!

This little vacuum cleaner is made to suck up trash in the ocean!
The only problem is, more and more trash is being thrown into the ocean...

This game was made for #Seajam in Pico-8

Controls:
  Keyboard:

    Movement: ←↑↓→
    Suck: z
    Options: Enter

  Gamepad:

    Movement: Joystick
    Suck: a/y
    Options: Start

If your storage is full, go above water and press Suck to deposit trash
